Class GzipFilter

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.ehcache.constructs.web.filter.Filter
      net.sf.ehcache.constructs.web.filter.GzipFilter
          gov.nih.nci.cabig.caaers.web.filters.GzipFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.servlet.Filter
public class GzipFilter
extends net.sf.ehcache.constructs.web.filter.GzipFilter

Provides GZIP compression of responses.

See the filter-mappings.xml entry for the gzip filter for the URL patterns which will be gzipped. At present this includes .jsp, .js and .css.

Version:
$Id: GzipFilter.java 233 2006-11-18 03:11:18Z gregluck $
Author:
Greg Luck, Adam Murdoch
